overview:
Brandt Page - about.me/brandtpage Entrepreneur, Father, Husband, CEO of Launch Leads

Some call me Brandt, others call me Bubba :) I live in Salt Lake City, UT but grew up in the Bay Area, CA.

Connect on Linkedin & Facebook & Twitter & Google+

Here is my official “bio”: Brandt Page is the founder and CEO of Launch Leads, formerly Launch Sales and Marketing. Launch works with B2B companies to fill their sales pipelines with qualified leads and scheduled sales appointments in a pay for performance model.

Brandt was named the Emerging Executive of the Year 2009 by the Utah Technology Council.

Launch Leads was voted a â€œTop 25 Under 5â€ by the Utah Valley Entrepreneurial Forum in 2011.

American Express selected him to advise their national OPEN Forum Pulse on Twitter and his Twitter @BrandtPage and @LaunchSales were selected as a Top 40 sales people on twitter to follow.

Brandt was nominated for the “INC 30 Under 30” award in 2010, & was elected into the vSpring Capital Top 100 Venture Entrepreneurs elite group in both 2010 and 2011.

Launch has been featured in the Utah CEO magazine as the 6th fastest growing company in Utah (2010).

Launch was also named the CrowdPitch Winner (2010) from Funding Universe & was a Utah Start-up of the Year finalist 2010.

Brandt was a speaker at the Utah Governorâ€™s Economic Summit 2010 & has lectured at the LDS Business College, SLCC, Utah Valley Business Summit, & Utah Technology Council.

He is a mentor for the Community Foundation of Utah, Boys and Girls Club of Salt Lake City and works with at-risk youth in Utah. He is supported by his wife Jordan, son Hutch, and daughter Priya.
